translation:
My good friend and Lord

Not being able to withdraw from the market price any item belonging to the seizure, an order goes to Your Lordship Inácio for the 40$rs. from the subscriptions, and send it to

Your sincere and grateful friend Almeida Piratini, November 9, 1838.

Illustrious Lord Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. His estate in Salso. Letters from the Excellent Domingos José de Almeida dated November 7 and 9, received on the 18th of the same month and answered on the 28th of said month.
